short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill all your missing days in one simple click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of filling missing days in Hilan System ? No More!
Now, with one click, you can fill all your missing days automatically !
Just browse into you reporting page. (usually at https://your-company-name.net.hilan.co.il/Hilannetv2/Attendance/calendarpage.aspx)
choose the desired month, and use the extension.
